summary: Mixpanel's tracking and information use on Mixpanel Sites is governed by the Mixpanel Privacy Statement found at https://mixpanel.com/legal/privacy-policy/.
The Mixpanel Privacy Statement does not cover information processed on behalf of the Customer for Application Services.
It is the Customer's responsibility to provide their own privacy statement or notice to End Users.
The Customer must also provide required disclosures and obtain necessary consents from their employees and/or agents.
Mixpanel may collect registration and other information about the Customer through Mixpanel Sites.
